BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: THE PETER AND MARY LEVIN FAMILY

ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.FormAndInfoAndMaterialsTxt: THE FOUNDATION ACCEPTS WRITTEN APPLICATIONS FROM ORGANIZATIONS EXEMPT FROM TAXATION UNDER INTERNAL REVENUE CODE 501(C)(3) AND DESCRIBED IN SECTION 509 (A)(1), (2) OR (3).
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.RestrictionsOnAwardsTxt: IN AWARDING GRANTS, THE FOUNDATION SEEKS TO STRENGTHEN THE WORLD THROUGH SERVICES THAT WORK TO ELIMINATE SOCIAL AND CIVIL INJUSTICE, THEREBY PROVIDING INDIVIDUALS AND FAMILIES WITH DIGNITY, A BETTER QUALITY OF LIFE AND INCREASED ECONOMIC AND SOCIAL OPPORTUNITY. THE FOUNDATION SHALL CONSIDER SUPPORTING ORGANIZATIONS THAT ADVANCE THIS FOCUS AREA BY AFFECTING CHANGE IN PEOPLE'S ATTITUDES AND PUBLIC POLICY; INCREASING THE ABILITY OF PEOPLE TO FREELY EXPRESS THEIR BELIEFS; PROVIDING A SAFETY NET FOR DISADVANTAGED INDIVIDUALS; ACCESS TO EDUCATION AND THE ARTS; ACCESS TO HEALTH SERVICES; SUPPORTING THE JEWISH COMMUNITY; AND SUPPORTING OTHER COMMUNITIES OF INTEREST INCLUDING GREATER CINCINNATI, AND SCHOOLS, COLLEGES AND UNIVERSITIES CONNECTED TO THE LEVIN FAMILY.

GrantOrContributionPdDurYrGrp.GrantOrContributionPurposeTxt: SUPPORT LEGAL EFFORTS FOR IN NEED
